617570.name: Switch
617570.description:
Switch is a powerful universal audio file converter and compressor that allows you to quickly and easily convert your sound files. Switch is very flexible and accepts over 40 file formats to convert from. Convert from WMA to MP3, MP3 to WAV, FLAC to MP3. With Switch, it is easy to switch those hard to find audio files into popular and usable files in minutes. Simply drag and drop your files into Switch, select the file format and output folder you prefer, and click convert!

Switch Features Include:
  • Drag and drop your files directly into the interface.
  • Import multiple file formats at the same time and convert to one output format.
  • Pull and convert a playlist (m3u and pls)
  • Add music from a CD or extract audio from a DVD.
  • Play your tracks before you convert to preview them.
  • Customize your final files with a selection of options for each format.
  • Choose your Switch settings by adjusting your overwrite, conversion and CD track features.
  • Take advantage of efficiency of batch conversion by converting up to 32000 files during one batch.
  • Use the right-click option to quickly convert selected file formats from outside the application.
  • Normalize your audio automatically for quality, while you are converting.
  • Edit your audio and music files by connecting to WavePad Audio Editor through the Switch interface.
  • Access online database to add song information as you convert.

Some Supported Formats Include: mp3, wma, wav, dss, flac, aiff, m4a, ogg, avi, mid, gsm, mov, amr, au, aac, raw, vox and many more.
